[h1] History [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
A long time ago I played this game called Counter Strike Global Offensive ( maybe you heard of it ), and I thought to myself, damn mass, this game is so shit I cant believe you spent 20‚Ç¨ on it, whoever made this must only make crap games. After a while I decided to give the makers of CSGO another go ( get it, another GO heh ). Anyway they are called Source engine or something like that and they made this game as well, called CS Source which I am reviewing here.

[h1] Better than the new one? [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
I have to admit, they definitely didnt improve throught the years considering CSS came out in 2004 and CS Global Garbage in 2012 and even through 1000 updates they still didnt make GO as fun as this one. 

[h1] Gunplay [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
Now, you aim, shoot and kill, as simple as that, there is something called 'gun recoil' but you can just ignore that, just run and gun mate like its COD4 FFA.

[h1] Movement[/h1]
[hr][/hr]
If you dont bind jump to mousecroll up and push like a  f u c k i n g  idiot from ivy, out middle, through our connector like a SPEED DEMON, then you arent doing it right.

[h1] Maps [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
I mean Source engine hired some good map designers for this one and the maps are good but even if you dont like that the community is there to make some spicy maps for you, like that one called de_dusk2 or something like that, pretty cool map if you ask me.

[h1] Netcode [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
I mean the game is pre 2012 so there is no need to mention that the hit-reg and netcode is all on point, unlike some games.

[h1] Optimisation [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
Well it didnt have a panorama update yet so its working fine.

[h1] Are you gonna be serious for a moment you fucking clown!? [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
No.

[h1] Conclusion [/h1][hr][/hr]
It is very arcady and fun to play, especially if you have friends to mess around with. 10/10 would make a movie out of this called too much for Z block which no one would watch.

mainly bc you can suck off a lot of dudes

The game should be free considering it's compete lack of developer support. Playing this technical demo causes no emotions rather than pure frustration.

Bots are completely broken: pathfinding is glitchy as hell, timings are absolutely random and unpredictable on any difficulty.
Movement is also broken -- climbing some boxes and even tactically critical passages requires lots of learning and lots of luck.
Stupid bots and allies constantly block each other -- you have to install plugins to solve this.
There is no vanilla servers left and valve does not host any.
Best Counter-Strike  ever made personally for me. Great mechanics, gameplay, and community. Worth every euro!
